example.eg: Speaking Urdu was a prerequisite for the job.

dsense.name: prerequisite
dsense.guideword: (study: prior course) (指选修某门课前必须先修的课程)

example.eg: English 101 is a prerequisite for the Shakespeare course.
Knowledge of physics is prerequisite for this course.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 必要的, 先决条件的
